# Read the state of Game Center for an app

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get Game Center detail information for an app.

## Getting Game Center detail information

- **GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/gameCenterDetail**
- **GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/gameCenterEnabledVersions**
title: Read the state of Game Center for an app
